short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to remind you to take breaks and track your progress.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Break Reminder :-  Boost Your Productivity and Well-being!

Take regular breaks and maintain your well-being with the Break Reminder Chrome extension. Designed for those who spend long hours working on their computers, this extension helps you stay productive and healthy by reminding you to take breaks at optimal intervals.

- Key Features :-

- Daily Streak Tracking: Keep track of your daily break habits and earn points for consistency. Visual streak counters help you stay motivated.
- Mood Check-ins: Monitor your mood throughout the day and reflect on how breaks affect your well-being.
- Mindfulness Exercises: Access a variety of guided exercises to help you relax and recharge during breaks.
- Customizable Break Intervals: Set your preferred break times to match your workflow and ensure you're taking breaks when you need them.
- Visual Countdown Timer: Always know when your next break is due with a countdown timer that's easy to follow.
